Header: Directorate of Psy Ops Organizes One More Lecture
Content: A valuable lecture on ‘Young age and Woman soldier’ was conducted by Lieutenant Colonel B. G. S Samanthi of National Cadet Corps (NCC) for the benefit of woman recruits under training at Sandunpura Recruit Training Centre for woman soldiers on Thursday (13). Organized by the Directorate of Psychological Operations, the lecture covered a wide area of day to day domestic and social issues as well as their personal concerns. 100 plus troops including Officers attended the lecture.
